name: .SXI File Extension
summary: Learn about .SXI files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Presentation originally created by StarOffice Impress, a program used for creating slide shows; generally follows a slide layout template and contains a title slide followed by content slides; supports audio, video, and transition effects.

content: SXI files were used by StarOffice version 5 and Apache OpenOffice version 1 (previously part of OpenOffice.org). Earlier versions of StarOffice used .SDP files for presentations. Later versions of Apache OpenOffice use the .ODP format for presentations.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
